official_title: To authorize the President to award posthumously the Congressional Gold Medal to Jeremy Glick of West Milford, New Jersey, a passenger aboard United Airlines Flight 93 for acts of bravery, courage, and patriotism.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to award posthumously a Congressional Gold Medal to Jeremy Glick of West Milford, New Jersey, for acts of bravery as a passenger aboard United Airlines Flight 93 which crashed on September 11, 2001 as a result of a terrorist hijacking.

titles.title: To authorize the President to award posthumously the Congressional Gold Medal to Jeremy Glick of West Milford, New Jersey, a passenger aboard United Airlines Flight 93 for acts of bravery, courage, and patriotism.
